paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual case details.

patients.phenotype: history of breast cancer on both sides of the family

individual_records.phenotype_details: history of breast cancer on both sides of the family - paternal grandmother (unknown age) and maternal grandfather (age 60)
individual_records.evidence_sentence: In another case, a canonical splice acceptor variant of BRCA2 (familial breast/ovarian cancer, MIM: 612555) was identified in a 38-year-old female who had a history of breast cancer on both sides of the family - paternal grandmother (unknown age) and maternal grandfather (age 60).

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with familial breast/ovarian cancer.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is associated with a family history of breast cancer.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was identified in a patient with a significant family history of breast cancer.
key_quotes: In another case, a canonical splice acceptor variant of BRCA2 (familial breast/ovarian cancer, MIM: 612555) was identified in a 38-year-old female who had a history of breast cancer on both sides of the family.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extraction was straightforward with clear identification of the BRCA2 variant.
